text: Kamilla Bartone (born 7 June 2002) is a Latvian junior tennis player. Bartone has a career high ITF junior combined ranking of 6 achieved on 21 October 2019. Bartone won the 2019 US Open on girls' doubles with Oksana Selekhmeteva. Bartone made her WTA main draw debut at the 2019 Baltic Open in the doubles draw partnering Ksenia Aleshina. ==Junior Grand Slam finals== ===Girls' doubles: 2 (1 title, 1 runner–up)===
